(1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal kembali hidup semula?
come back to life, come back from the grave, come to life, resurrection
Hidup kembali, bangkit dari kubur, hidup semula, terjadinya kebangkitan dari maut
(2) What words refer to causing someone to come back to life?
(2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tindakan yang menyebabkan seseorang itu hidup kembali?
resurrect, raise from the dead, bring back to life, bring back from the dead
Membangkitkan, membangunkan jasad yang mati dari kubur, menghidupkan semula, memberi nyawa untuk hidup kembali dari maut
(3) What words refer to the condition or state of living forever?
(3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada keadaan hidup yang berkekalan?
live forever, (have) eternal life, life everlasting, immortality, life after death
Hidup untuk selama-lamanya, mempunyai hidup kekal, menerimai kehidupan yang berkekalan, diberi hidup yang kekal abadi
(4) What words refer to reincarnation?
reincarnation, reincarnated

Religious organization
Organisasi keagamaan
Religious organization
Organisasi keagamaan

Use this domain for words referring to official religions, groups within a religion, and religious meetings. Each religion will have different names for its groups. Answer each question for each religion.

Gunakan domain ini untuk lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada oraganisasi agama, kumpulan agama dan pertemuan agama yang dikendalikan secara rasmi. Setiap organisasi agama rasmi akan memberi nama yang berlainan kepada kumpulan-kumpulan rasmi yang di bawah naungannya. Gunakan panduan soal jawap berikut untuk setiap oraganisasai agama yang rasmi.
(1) What general words refer to an official religion?
(1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang biasanya digunakan untuk merujuk kepada suatu organisasi agama yang rasmi?
religion, faith
Agama rasmi, kepercayaan rami, agama atau kepercayaan yang diiktirafkan oleh pihak kerajaan
(2) What are the names of the official religions?
(2) Apakah nama-nama organisasi agama yang rasmi?
Christianity, Islam, Hinduism, Judaism, animism, paganism

Agama Kristian - kepercayaan umat Kristian, agama Islam - kepercayaan umat Islam, agama Hindu - kepercayaan umat Hindu, agama Yahudi - kepercayaan umat Yahudi, agama Buddha - kepercayaan pengikut-pengikut Buddha. Nota: Animisme adalah diiktirafkan kerajaan sebagai sebahagian daripada budaya orang tempatan kafir bukannya sebagai suatu agama rami; kepercayaan bahawa semua benda adalah bernyawa - penyembahan alam semulajadi seperti gunung kinabalu terutamanya pada masa-masa lampau
(3) What words refer to a group within a religion?
(3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada kumpulan-kumpulan tertentu dalan suatu organisasi agama yang rasmi itu?
sect, denomination, party
Denominasi, gerakan misi, evangelikal, karismatik, apostolik, profetik dsn, mazhab-golongan ortodoks, tidak ortodoks, Roman Katolik, Katolik, Protestan dsn
(4) What are the names of the sects?
Catholic, Protestant, Baptist, Presbyterian, Methodist
(5) What words refer to a group of believers in a particular place?
(5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sekumpulan orang Kristian yang temu berbakti di suatu tempat?
church, congregation, diocese, parish
Jemaah gereja setempat, jemaah Kristian di bandar atau kota, jemaah Kristian di suatu dearah atau kawasan jagaan uskup atau bishop, jemaah suatu perkampungan - jemaah gereja kariah
(6) What words refer to beginning to believe in a religion or changing from one religion to another?

(6) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan perihal bermulanya seseorang itu menganuti suatu kepercayaan atau agama tertentu ataupun seseorang yang meninggalkan kepercayaan atau agama asalnya untuk yang lain?
convert, conversion

Tukar agama - ubah pegangan - memeluk ugama - menganuti agama - menjadi pengikut kepercayaan tertentu (pengikut Kristus) - menjadi kawan baru (agama Islam) - mualaf (agama Islam), pertaubatan (umat Kristian - contoh: tukar atau ubah pendirian rohani iaitu dari orang kafir yang berdosa kepada orang yang beriman yang telah menerima pengampunan dosa-dosanya) - pemelukan - penganutan - permualafan
Old questions for \oldis 4.9.7
(4) What are the names of the (Christian) denominations?
(4) Apakah antara nama-nama denominasi Kristian?
Catholic, Protestant, Baptist, Presbyterian, Methodist
Katolik, Protestan, Baptis, Presbyterian, Methodis, Basel, Anglikan, Kalvari, Khabar Baik, Evangelikal dsn
Religious person
Religious practitioner
Orang yang mengerjakan amal ibadah agama atau kepercayaannya

Use this domain for words referring to religious practitioners--people who practice a religion, who are members of the religion, believe in the religion, leaders of the religion, and followers of the religion. Each religion has its own terms for religious practitioners. List these terms separately for each religion. The examples given below are for the Christian religion.

Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada orang-orang yang mengerjakan amal ibadah agama atau kepercayaan mereka - mereka yang taat kepada ajaran-ajaran agama atau kepercayaan mereka, mereka yang telah menjadi anggota, yang mengerjakan iman mereka, para pemimpin dan para pengikut agama atau kepercayaan itu. (Kepercayaan Umat Kristian: Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada para pekerja atau pelayan Tuhan dan kerajaannNya - para jemaah yang taat kepada firman Tuhan, jemaah yang telah menjadi aggota tubuh Kristus dan gereja setempat, umat yang mengerjakan iman mereka, para pemimpin dan para pengikut ajaran Tuhan Kristus Yesus.) Setiap agama atau kepercayaan mempunyai istilah khusus bagi yang setia mengerjakan amal ibadah mereka. Senaraikan secara berasingan istilah-istilah untuk agama atau kepercayaan yang berlainan. Istilah-istilah yang digunakan dalam domain ini adalah berdasarkan kepercayaan umat Kristian.
(1) What is a person called who believes in a religion?
(1) Bagaimana merujuk kepada seseorang yang percaya kepada ajaran-ajaran dalam agama atau kepercayaan tertentu pada umumnya?
believer, member (of the faith), adherent, follower, practitioner
Orang beriman, aggota umat yang percaya, penyokong- kawan baru, pengikut
(2) What is a person called who believes in the (Christian) religion?
(2) Bagaimana merujuk kepada seseorang yang percaya kepada ajaran-ajaran dalam agama atau kepercayaan umat Kristian?
Christian, brother, fellow believer, saint

Kristian - - pengikut Yesus Kristus, orang yang beriman kepada Yesus Kristus, saudara atau saudari dalam Yesus Kristus - anggota tubuh Kristus - anggota jemaah setempat, anggota seiman - saksi Yesus Kristus, orang kudus (suci, salih)
(3) What is a leader of the (Christian-Protestant) religion called?
(3) Bagaimana merujuk kepada seseorang pemimpin agama atau kepercayaan umat Kristian Protestan?
pastor, minister, parson
Gembala (pastor) - pengajar - penginjil - nabi - rasul, pelayan (pelapis) - penatua - bishop, paderi - uskup - ketua uskup atau uskup agung
(4) What is a leader of the (Christian-Catholic) religion called?
(4) Bagaimana merujuk kepada seseorang pemimpin agama atau kepercayaan umat Kristian Katolik?
priest, father, bishop, archbishop, Cardinal, pope, man of the cloth
Rahib (lelaki, perempuan), paderi (pendeta), bishop, ketua uskup (uskup agung), kardinal, paus, dari golongan (jabatan) paderi
(5) What words refer to the profession of being a religious leader?
(5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada jawatan kepimpinan dalam hal keagamaan dan kerohanian?
pastorate, priesthood, ministry

Bagi umat Kristian: jabatan paderi - jabatan atau pelayanan para gembala, jabatan pendeta - jabatan atau pelayanan para pengajar, jabatan atau pelayanan para penginjil, jabatan atau pelayanan profetik, jabatan atau pelayanan apostolik, jawatan imamat rajani - pendoa syafaat
(6) What words refers to all religious leaders?
(6) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada semua pemimpin hal keagamaan dan kerohanian?
clergy

Khususnya: yang berjawatan rasmi dalam gereja. Jabatan paderi- jawatan kepimpinan: para rasul, para nabi, para peninjil, para pengajar para gembala - uskup agung, bishop, dekan dan pelayan-pelayan penuh masa (memimpin orang mengenal Tuhan, beriman seperti Yesus Kristus dan bertumbuh dalam Roh Kudus). Umumnya: yang biasanya melayani secara sukarela dan tidak berjawatan rasmi dalam gereja. Pendoa syafaat - imamat rajani - pelayan kerajaan Tuhan - pekerja di ladang Tuhan - saksi Tuhan Yesus - pemimpin kebaktian di gereja atau rumah
(7) What words refer to followers of a religion who are not leaders?
laity, layperson, flock

Jubah paderi, bishop, uskup agung, kardinal & paus, jubah rahib lelaki & perempuan menurut mazhab, kain jubah yang tidak bercorak dan berwarna-warni - kain jubah yang sejenis warnanya sahaja kecuali untuk pakaian lengkap rasmi uskup agung

(8) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada para pengikut yang tidak terlibat dalam kepimpinan suatu agama atau kepercayaan?
laity, lay person, flock

house of God, church, temple, synagogue, mosque, shrine, god house, religious sanctuary

Rumah Tuhan - tempat menyembah Tuhan, gereja - tempat amal ibadah orang Kristian, bangunan tempat kehadiran Tuhan dinyatakan atau tempat Tuhan bersemayan di antara manusia (orang Yahudi, orang Kristian) - kuil (orang Hindu) - tokong (orang Cina), biah - tempat orang Yahudi beramal-ibadah, masjid (orang Islam), tempat keramat (orang Jepun dsn), peti atau bangunan kecil yang dikhususkan untuk menyimpan patung atau benda-benda yang dipuja (kepercayaan Shinto dsn), tempat suci untuk bersembayang & menyembah Tuhan

Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan berfikiran dan berkelakuan mengingkari Tuhan atau kepercayaan terhadapNya (agama)
(1) What is a person called who does not believe in a religion?
(1) Bagaimanakah seseorang yang tidak berkepercayaan dalam Tuhan atau tidak beragama dirujuk?
unbeliever, pagan, gentile, heathen, atheist, agnostic, irreligious, godless

Orang yang tidak berkepercayaan dalam Tuhan, orang kafir, orang yang tidak berketurunan Yahudi dan dianggap tidak berkepercayaan kepada Tuhan Maha Esa umat Yahudi, orang yang tidak beradab kerana kejahilan perihal Tuhan dan cara beramal ibadah terhadapNya, ateis - orang yang tidak percaya akan kewujudan Tuhan, agnostik - orang yang mengingkari sebarang bukti kewujudan Tuhan, orang yang tidak beragama, orang yang tidak alim atau mangingkari Tuhan dalam kehidupan mereka
(2) What words refer to a religious group, which the official religion considers to be false?
(2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada segolongan orang yang amalan agamanya dianggap oleh pihak agama rasmi sebagai tidak benar?
false religion, sect
Agama palsu - kepercayaan palsu, mazhab ajaran sesat
(3) What words refer to a belief, which the official religion considers to be false?
(3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada suatu kepercayaan (fahaman dogma) yang dianggap oleh pihak agama rasmi sebagai bercanggah dengan kebenaran?
heresy, heretical, heretic, false doctrine/teaching
Bidaah, yang menyimpang daripada dogma yang dianggap benar (rasmi), pembidaah, ajaran atau fahaman sesat - di luar dogma gereja
(4) What words refer to thinking against God?
(4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal mempunyai fikiran yang menentang (anti) Tuhan?
disbelieve, unbelief, lack of faith, doubt, skepticism, agnosticism, atheism, paganism

Enggan mempercayai, ketidakpercayaan, tidak beriman atau mempercayai sepenuhnya, meragui - waham, mempunyai kecurigaan, agnostisisme - fahaman yang mengingkari sebarang bukti kewujudan Tuhan, ateisme - ketidakpercayaan perihal kewujudan Tuhan, kekafiran
(5) What words refer to speaking against God?
(5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal mengeluarkan kata-kata yang menentang Tuhan?
blaspheme, scoff, profane, irreverent
Mencaci, mencemuh, mencerca kesucian - memburukkan nama Tuhan yang suci, menunjukkan sikap atau berkelakuan tidak menghormati - mengutuk
(6) What words refer to acting against God?
(6) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal melakukan perkara-perkara yang bertentangan dengan kehendak Tuhan?
sin, impiety, ungodly, godlessness, desecrate, sacrilege

Berdosa, tidak memuliakan Tuhan, kehidupan yang mengingkari Tuhan, hidup di luar (dalam kejahilan perihal) kehendak Tuhan - hidup dalam dosa (kegelapan, kejahatan), menyalahgunakan tempat atau benda yang suci, pencemaran (pelanggaran, pencabulan) kehidupan seseorang atau sesuatu (benda, tempat dsn) yang dianggap suci atau yang telah dikuduskan
(7) What words describe someone who is against God?
(7) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menjelaskan perihal seseorang yang menentang Tuhan?
impious, irreligious, profane

Tidak alim - tidak salih, tidak beragama- tidak berkepercayaan kepada Tuhan - t idak beramal ibadah kepada Tuhan- tiada berpegangan rohani - tidak beriman - agnostik -ateistik - murtad - anti -Tuhan Maha Esa yang benar, memburukkan (tidak memuliakan) nama Tuhan dan memfitnah umat Tuhan yang percaya dalan nama kudusNya
(8) What words refer to turning away from God?
(8) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal membelakangkan Tuhan atau tidak lagi mempercayai dan mentaatiNya?
apostasy, backsliding, reprobate

Murtad - meninggalkan kepercayaan dan hidup beramal ibadah kepada Tuhan, kembali hidup seperti orang kafir - hilang kepercayaan terhadap Tuhan - mundur beramal ibadah dalam kebenaran - hidup dalam keruntuhan moral, menyangkal Tuhan - mengutuk Tuhan - hidup dalam kejahatan atau dosa
(9) What words refer to pretending to be religious?
hypocrisy, hypocrite
(10) What words refer to extreme beliefs that are evil?
fanatic, fanaticism, bigot, bigotry
(11) What words refer to religious practices that are done in ignorance?
superstition
(12) What words refer to allowing other people to practice their religion?
tolerance, intolerance

Use this domain for words referring to prepared food. Cultures vary widely in the number and types of foods they prepare, and in how they classify them. For instance the English distinction between main dish and side dish is not found in the classification system of other languages. If your language has well-recognized subcategories, you can set up a separate subdomain for each. The questions below are based on the main ingredient in the dish.

Naked

Use this domain for words related to being naked--not wearing any clothes, and for words referring to how a person feels about being naked. It is a part of universal human experience that people do not want to be naked. So there are words that refer to feeling bad if one does not have enough clothes on (shame). Other words refer to wanting to have enough clothes (modest). Other words refer to how people feel about other people who do not wear enough clothes (indecent).
(1) What words refer to being naked?
be naked, nakedness, nude, nudity, unclothed, nothing on, not have anything on, stripped, bare, expose (oneself)
(2) What words refer to not wearing enough clothes?
dress immodestly, immodest, impropriety, indecent
(3) What words refer to not wanting to be naked?
modest, propriety, decent
(4) What words refer to feeling bad if you are naked?
shame, embarrassed, blush

Old questions for \oldis 6.1.2
Try, attempt
Try
Cuba
Use this domain for words indicating that someone is trying to do something.
(1) What words refer to trying to do something?

try, attempt, make an attempt, experiment, test, make a stab at it, give it a go, try it out, see if it works, make an effort, aim to do something, assay, endeavor, essay, seek to do something, strain, struggle, undertake, venture, give it a whirl, have a try, try and do something, see if you can do something
John <tried> to bake bread.
(2) What words refer to trying hard to do something?
do your best, try your best, put your mind to it, make an effort, be at pains to do something, strive, to the best of your ability, do the best you can, as best you can, give something your best
John is <striving> to earn enough money to buy a bicycle.
(3) What words refer to doing all you can when you are trying to do something?
try for all your worth, do your utmost, do everything you can, do all you can, give your all, pull out all the stops, struggle to do something, go to great lengths to do something
(4) What words refer to trying to do something, even though you are unlikely to succeed?
have a go, have a stab at, give it a go, put up a good show
(5) What words refer to trying hard to get something that you really want?
try for, go for, try out for, shoot for, make a bid for, struggle for, go all out, go after
(6) What words refer to trying hard to do something for someone?
bend over backwards to do something, go out of your way to do something, take the trouble to do something
(7) What words refer to doing something in order to try to do something else?
try and do something, in an effort to do something, in an attempt to do something
(8) What words refer to an attempt to do something?
attempt (n), endeavor (n), try (n), campaign, drive
The <attempt> was unsuccessful.

Use this domain for general words related to growing grain crops such as barley, maize (corn), millet, oats, rice, rye, sesame, sorghum, and wheat. If one crop is cultivated extensively and there are many words related to it, set up a separate domain for it. This has already been done for rice, wheat, and maize, since they are so common around the world.

(1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada penanaman bijirin?

menanam bijirin/biji-bijian

Harvest
Tuai
Harvest
Tuai

Use this domain for words related to harvesting crops. If there is an important crop and there are a lot of words that refer to harvesting it, set up a special domain for it, such as 'Harvest rice' or 'Harvest coconuts'. If there is more than one such crop, set up a separate domain for each of them.

Gunakan bidang lingkungan ini untuk kata-kata yang berkaitan dengan menuai tanam-tanaman. Jika ada satu tanaman yang penting dan ada banyak kata-kata yang merujuk kepada cara menuainya, buatlah satu bidang lingkungan untuknya, seperti "Menuai Padi"atau "Menuai kelapa". Jika ada lebih daripada satu tanaman seperti itu, buatlah satu bidang lingkungan untuk setiapnya.
(1) What words refer to harvesting?
(1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada menuai?
harvest, reap, gather in the harvest
menuai, memetik, mengumpulkan tuaian
(2) What special words are used for harvesting each crop?
(2) Apakah kata-kata istimewa yang digunakan untuk menuai setiap tanaman itu?
harvest maize, harvest rice, harvest yams, harvest beans, pick fruit, pluck an apple, dig potatoes, pull carrots, cut vegetables
menuai jagung, menuai padi, mencabut keladi, memetik kacang, memetik buah, memetik apel, menggali kentang, mencabut lobak merah, memotong sayur
(3) What words refer to what is harvested?
(3) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada apa yang dituai?
crop, harvest, yield
tuaian, hasil
(4) What tools and machines are used to harvest crops?
(4) Apakah alat-alat dan mesin yang digunakan untuk menuai tanam-tanaman?
harvester
mesin penuai, sabit
(5) What is done to a field after the crops are harvested?
(5) Apakah yang dibuat untuk ladang yang sudah dituai?
lie fallow, animals graze, plow under plants
dibiarkan, tempat haiwan meragut rumput
(6) What words describe a crop that is ready to harvest?
ripe
(7) What words refer to the time of harvest?
harvest, harvest time

Tool
Alat

Use this domain for general words for tools and machines. The domains in this section should be used for general tools and machines that are used in a variety of tasks. Specialized tools and machines should be classified under the specific work or activity for which they are used.

Gunakan bidang lingkungan ini untuk kata-kata am yang merujuk kepada alat-alat. Perbezaan di antara alat dan mesin mungkin tiada di dalam sebahagian bahasa. Perbezaan di sini bererti adalah di antara alat yang sederhana dan alat yang lebih canggih serta ada banyak bahagiannya (mesin)
(1) What general words refer to tools?
(1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada alat?
tool, implement, utensil, device, instrument, gadget, hardware, paraphernalia
alat, alat pertukangan besi
(2) What words refer to a set of tools?
(2) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada suatu kumpulan alat?
kit, tool kit
peti perkakas, peti alat
(3) What words refer to a container for tools?
(3) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada bekas alat-alat?
toolbox, tool cabinet
kotak alat, almari alat
(4) What tools are used for climbing?
ladder, stepladder, rope ladder, rung, step
(5) What words refer to all the tools and other things you need to do a job?
equipment, apparatus, gear, kit, things, stuff, tools

Posture
Postur/gaya tubuh badan
Posture
Postur/gaya tubuh badan

Use this domain for general words indicating the posture or stance of a person's body. Use the domains in this section for specific words for postures and for moving parts of the body. Many of these words have two meanings. One meaning is stative, indicating that the body is in a particular posture, but not moving. The other meaning is active, indicating that the person is moving his body into a particular posture. Some of these words can be used of animals or even things, if the things are perceived as being similar in posture to that of a human body.

Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan umum yang menunjukkan postur/kedudukan diri atau cara/gaya tubuh badan seseorang. Gunakan domain-domain dalam bahagian ini bagi mencari perkataan-perkataan tertentu yang merujuk kepada postur. Banyak daripada perkataan-perkataan ini mempunyai dua makna. Satu daripadanya bermaksud keadaan tubuh berada dalam postur tertentu, tetapi tidak bergerak. Manakala yang satu lagi menunjukkan orang tersebut sedang menggerakkan tubuhnya ke dalam suatu postur tertentu. Beberapa daripada perkataan-perkataan ini juga dapat digunakan bagi postur binatang ataupun benda-benda jika ia menyerupai postur tubuh manusia.

posture, stance, pose, position
postur, gaya, posisi, kedudukan

mengubah postur/kedudukan diri seseorang, bergaya, berganjak, menggeliat-geliut

Bow
Tunduk
Bow
Tunduk

Use this domain for words referring to bowing to someone--to face someone and lower your head or bend at the waist so that your upper body is lowered. The words in this domain should all be symbolic acts, that is, the culture assigns a meaning and significance to the physical action. Some cultures define it as a greeting, as an act of respect, or as an act of submission. For instance in ancient middle eastern culture bowing was an act of submission done in the presence of the king. Failure to bow was an act of rebellion punishable by death. In far eastern culture it is a greeting. In African culture it is an act of respect or done to welcome a visitor. Cultures define how a person is to bow, for instance how they are to hold their hands. A person may bow while standing, or may kneel, or even prostrate himself flat on his face. Whether both people bow is also significant. The depth of the bow can have significance. In Japan the person of lower social rank must bow deeper. In European culture a performer bows to acknowledge applause.

Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tindakan menundukkan diri atau badan kepada seseorang - menghadap seseorang dengan menundukkan kepala atau membongkokkan badan supaya bahagian atas tubuh seseorang direndahkan. Perkataan-perkataan di dalam domain ini kesemuanya haruslah di dalam bentuk tindakan-tindakan simbolik, iaitu budaya berkenaan menerima ataupun memberi suatu makna dan kepentingan kepada tindakan fizikal itu. Beberapa budaya mendefinisikannya sebagai sapaan, suatu tindakan penghormatan atau penyerahan. Contohnya: Pada zaman kuno di timur tengah,menunduk merupakan suatu tindakan menyerah yang dilakukan di hadapan raja. Kegagalan berbuat demikian menandakan ia adalah suatu tindakan memberontak dan boleh dikenakan hukuman mati. Bagi kebudayaan di timur jauh pula, ia merupakan sapaan. Dalam kebudayaan di Afrika, ia menunjukkan penghormatan atau dilakukan semasa mengalu-alukan kedatangan pengunjung. Budaya-budaya tertentu menentukan bagaimana seseorang menunduk, misalnya cara meletak tangan mereka. Tindakan menunduk ini mungkin dilakukan semasa berdiri, berlutut atau sujud sehingga muka/dahi menyentuh lantai. Sama ada kedua-dua orang yang berhadapan muka saling menundukkan diri atau salah seorang sahaja pun adalah penting. Rendahnya seseorang menunduk itu mungkin juga mempunyai kepentingannya. Di Jepun, orang dari taraf sosial rendah harus menunduk dengan lebih rendah. Dalam kebudayaan di Eropah, penghibur tunduk selepas mempersembahkan persembahan sebagai tanda penghargaan bagi tepukan yang diberikan oleh para penonton.
(1) What words refer to bowing?
(1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tunduk?
bow, bow down, bow to/before someone
tunduk, sujud, melutut/bersujud di hadapan seseorang
(2) What words describe how a person bows?
(2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan cara seseorang tunduk?
sweeping bow, bow low, deep bow, slight bow, bow your head, his head fell, incline your head, nod, curtsy, genuflect, kowtow, prostrate, grovel

tunduk serendah-rendahnya, tunduk dalam-dalam, tunduk kepala, angguk kepala, angguk ringkas, berlutut, melutut, bertelut, menelut, sujud, menyembah sujud, sujud hingga tertiarap, tersungkur, menyungkur, tunduk dengan membongkok sedikit, membongkokkan badan sebagai tanda tunduk
(3) What words indicate the significance of the bow?
(3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menjelaskan makna ketundukan itu?
obeisance, worship, bow in submission/reverence/greeting
sembah sujud, sembah, tunduk dalam penyerahan/penghormatan/sapaan

Move
Gerak
Move
Gerak

Use this domain for intransitive verbs of movement referring to moving your whole body to a different location. There are many components of meaning involved in verbs of movement. They can include a source location (from), a goal location (to), a path (along), manner (walk, run), speed (race, crawl), direction (forward, back, side, up, down, toward, away from), shape of the path (straight, curve, circle, angle), relationship to some object or objects (on, hang, against, between, across, through, into, out of, onto, off of, around), proximity (near, far), multiple movements (back and forth, return, bounce), inclusion with other objects or parts of objects (join, leave, collect, disperse, unite, separate), volition (go versus drift), intransitive versus transitive (move versus move something). Some verbs of movement do not involve moving from one place to another, but express bodily movement.

Sila gunakan domain ini bagi pergerakan kata-kata kerja tak transitif yang merujuk kepada tindakan menggerakkan seluruh tubuh seseorang kepada lokasi yang berlainan. Terdapat banyak makna komponen yang terlibat dalam kata-kata kerja pergerakan. Ianya boleh merangkumi lokasi sumber (daripada), lokasi tujuan (ke), sebuah laluan (sepanjang), cara (berjalan, berlari), kelajuan (berlumba, merangkak), arah (depan, belakang, tepi, atas, bawah, menghadap, jauh daripada), bentuk laluan (lurus, bengkok, bulat, selekoh, berliku-liku), hubungan kepada beberapa objek atau objek-objek (di atas, digantung, pada, di antara, melalui, ke dalam, keluar dari... ke atas, dari atas, sekeliling), hampir/dekat (dekat, jauh) pergerakan berganda (undur maju, pergi balik, lantun), ketermasukan dalam objek-objek atau bahagian-bahagian objek lain (bercantum, tinggalkan, takung, kumpul, serak, bersatu, berpadu, bercerai, berpisah), gerakan secara sengaja ataupun tidak sengaja, tidak transitif lawan transitif (bergerak lawan dengan menggerakkan sesuatu), sesetengah kata kerja pergerakan tidak melibatkan pergerakan dari suatu tempat ke tempat lain, tetapi menunjukkan pergerakan badan.

Use this domain for words referring to walking with some difficulty such as stumbling--to miss your step because of hitting an object such as a stone, hole, or mud; staggering--to walk unsteadily because of weakness, illness, or drunkenness; or limping--to walk unevenly or with difficulty because of injury to a foot.

Sila gunakan domain ini dengan menggunakan perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada berjalan kaki dengan sedikit kesukaran misalnya tersandung-kurang selangkah kerana terlanggar sesuatu benda seperti lubang batu, atau lumpur; terhuyung-hayang-berjalan dalam keadaan yang tidak betul disebabkan oleh kelemahan pada tubuh, penyakit, mabuk: atau longlai/tidak bermaya-berjalan dengan tidak seimbang atau dengan sukar disebabkan kecederaan pada kaki.

stumble, trip, trip and fall, slip

tersandung, tersandung sesuatu dan jatuh, tergelincir

Use this domain for words referring to something falling--for something to move down under the influence of gravity.

fall, drop, fall on

(3) What words refer to falling from a very high position?

(5) What words refer to almost falling?

(6) What words refer to falling off of something?
fall from, fall out, come off
(7) What words refer to the act of falling?
fall (n), avalanche
(8) What words refer to slowly falling?
sink slowly, float down, drift down, settle
(9) What words refer to something like rain or leaves falling through the air?
fall, drop, come down, parachute
(10) What words refer to letting something fall?

(12) What words refer to a building falling?

(16) What words refer to falling into water?
sink, fall overboard, plunge into, fall into, plop, plunk
(17) What words refer to the force that causes things to fall?
gravity
(18) What words refer to keeping something from falling?
hold up, prop up, brace

Move toward something

Move toward something
Bergerak ke arah sesuatu

Use this domain for words referring to moving toward, in the direction of, or near something or some place. The words in this domain should refer to moving in the direction of a place, but should not require that the person actually arrived. Some languages (such as German and Polish) distinguish 'go on foot' from 'go in a vehicle'.

Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada bergerak menuju, ke arah atau berhampiran sesuatu atau suatu tempat. Perkataan-perkataan di dalam domain ini hendaklah merujuk kepada bergerak menuju ke arah sesuatu tempat tetapi tidak semestinya orang itu tiba. Sesetengah bahasa (seperti bahasa Jerman dan bahasa Poland) membezakan â€˜berjalan kaki' daripada â€˜menaiki kenderaan'.

move toward, go toward, head toward, go in the (general) direction of
berjalan menuju ke arah, menghala
(2) What words refer to moving near something?
(2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada bergerak menghampiri sesuatu? mendekati, menghampiri, datang menghampiri/mendekati, menyergap, menyoroti (kamera)?
approach, move near, come near, move in on
(3) What words refer to two things moving toward each other?
(3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada dua benda menuju ke arah satu sama lain?

bertemu, berjumpa, berlanggar, berlaga, berhantuk, beradu

(4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tempat yang ditujui oleh seseorang?
destination, goal
destinasi, tujuan, arah, haluan, tempat tujuan

Wait
Menunggu
Wait
Menunggu

Use this domain for words referring to waiting in a place, waiting to do something, or waiting for something to happen. The basic idea of waiting is for someone to not do anything for a period of time, because he expects something to happen that will cause him to do something.

Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menunggu di sesuatu tempat, menunggu untuk melakukan sesuatu atau menunggu sesuatu akan terjadi. Bagi sesetengah orang, menunggu bermakna tidak melakukan apa-apa untuk beberapa jangka masa tertentu kerana orang berkenaan mengharap-harapkan sesuatu akan terjadi dan setelah apa yang diharap-harapkan itu terjadi barulah dia akan bertindak.
(1) What words refer to waiting?
(1) Apakah perkataa-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menunggu?

wait, wait for, wait up for, wait on, await, hang on, stand by, wait around, hang around, hold off, wait your turn, sit something out, cool your heels, bide your time, sit tight, sweat it out, hesitate, hesitation, wait and see, wait behind, lie in wait, waiting room, waiting list
tunggu, menunggu, menanti, menanti akan, bersedia, bersiap sedia, berjaga-jaga, tunggu dan lihat, berbaris menunggu giliran, ruang menunggu, senarai menunggu
(2) How do you tell someone to wait?
(2) Bagaimanakah anda meminta seseorang supaya menunggu?
Wait! Wait up. Just a minute. Just a moment. I'll be right with you. Hold on. Hang on. Please hold.
Tunggu! Tunggu dulu, Nanti! Nanti dulu, Sekejap. Sebentar. Kembali sebentar lagi. Sila tunggu sekejap/sebentar.
(3) What words refer to waiting in a line of people?
(3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menunggu dalam barisan?
line up, queue, stand in line, cut in line
berbaris, beratur, ikut giliran
(4) What words describe how a person feels when he must wait?
(4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan perasaan seseorang apabila orang berkenaan terpaksa menunggu?
look forward to, expectant, (I) can't wait, patient, impatient
tidak sabar-sabar, terharap-harap, menanti-nanti, menunggu-nunggu, saya tidak boleh menunggu, sabar, tidak sabar
(5) What words refer to making someone wait?
(5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada membuat seseorang menunggu?
keep someone waiting, make someone wait, delay
membuat seseorang menunggu/menanti, membiarkan (seseorang) menunggu/menanti, lambat, tergendala, lewat, tangguh, tunda
(6) What words refer to a period of time when you have to wait?
wait (n), delay (n)
(7) What words refer to refusing to wait patiently and going ahead of other people instead?
cut in line, cut in front of someone, cut someone off, jump the queue, push in

Organize

Use this domain for words referring to organizing things, people, events, and ideas--to think about and decide on the pattern a group of things should be arranged in, and then doing whatever is necessary to arrange them so that they can be used for some purpose. This domain is like the domain 'Arrange' except that 'Arrange' emphasizes physically moving the things, and the domain 'Organize' emphasizes the logical system. 'Organize' does not require that the things be moved, only that the logical pattern is specified.
(1) What words refer to organizing things?
organize, dispose, structure, get together, get it together, get your act together, chart, marshal, put in a chart, put in a table, put in a matrix, sort, sort out, systematize, tabulate
(2) What words refer to the pattern in which things are organized?
organization, ad hoc, alignment, apparatus, cycle, framework, hierarchy, mechanism, network, order, ordering, pattern, row, sequence, set-up, structure, system
(3) What tools and methods are used for organizing things?
table, matrix, chart, organizational chart, flow chart, grid, cubby hole, pigeon hole, in basket, out basket
(4) What words refer to organizing things a second time, or organizing things after they have been disorganized?
reorganize, reorganization, adjust, reform, reorder, reordering
(5) What words describe things that have been organized?
organized, ordered, well-ordered, orderly, in order, harmonious, shipshape, structured, systematic, tidy, everything in its place
(6) What words describe a person who organizes things well?
organized, methodical, neat, together
(7) What words refer to when everything is organized?
order

Use this domain for words referring to kicking--to hit something with your foot. The words in this domain may be distinguished by the way in which the foot moves, either in a swinging motion, or by first bending the leg and then quickly straightening it. They may also be distinguished by whether the foot moves horizontally or vertically, whether the effect is to move something or damage it, or how hard the person kicks.

Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menendangâ€”menggunakan kaki untuk memukul sesuatu. Perkataan-perkataan dalam domain ini mungkin akan dibezakan oleh cara kaki itu bergerak sama ada dalam bentuk ayunan ataupun dengan membengkokkan dahulu kaki kemudian meluruskannya dengan pantas. Ia juga mungkin dibezakan oleh pergerakan mendatar atau menegak kaki tersebut, sama ada kesannya adalah memindahkan sesuatu atau merosakkannya atau berapa kuatnya orang itu menendang.

Use this domain for words related to numbers. Every language has a word for 'one', and a word for 'two'. These two numbers often have special words. So we have included a separate domain for 'one' and 'two'. In addition the numbers form a series (one, two, three...). Most languages have more than one series of numbers (first, second, third...). So we have also included a domain for each series of numbers that most languages have. Your language may have other series of numbers. Put them in the domain 'Number series'.
(1) What words refer to a written number?
number, figure, digit, numeral
(2) What words refer to a number of people or things?
toll, statistics
(3) What words describe different kinds of numbers?
even, odd, positive, negative, infinite, cardinal, ordinal, whole, fraction, decimal
(4) What words refer to writing numbers on a series of things?
number (v), numbered
(5) What words indicate that there are a particular number of something?
number (v)
The group <numbered> fifty.

many more, much more, far more, far beyond, way beyond, a lot more

(2) What words refer to the smallest amount of something?
the least, minimum, the fewest, the lowest

the most

(4) What words refer to the smallest group?
the least

Almost
Hampir
Use this domain for words related to a number or amount that is almost the same as another number.
(1) What words indicate that something is almost a particular number or amount?
(1) Apakah perkataan menunjukkan sesuatu itu hampir kepada suatu nombor atau jumlah?
almost, nearly, close to, close on, approaching, nearing, not quite, be pushing, pretty well
Hampir, hampir-hampir, dekat, menjelang
He is almost 100 years old.
(2) What words indicate that someone has almost reached a place?
almost, nearly, just about
We are <almost> there.
(3) What words indicate that something has almost reached a particular state?

almost, nearly, very nearly, just about, practically, virtually, all but, as good as, to all intents and purposes, nearing, approaching, near to, close to, verging on, bordering on, more or less, pretty much, not quite
The clothes are <almost> dry.
(4) What words indicate that something is almost finished?
almost, nearly, just about, practically, as good as, more or less, not quite
We are <almost> finished.
(5) What words indicate that someone almost does something?
almost, nearly, very nearly, come close to, be on the verge of, come within an inch of
I <almost> hit you.
(6) What words indicate that something almost happens?
almost, be near to, be on the brink of, come within an inch of
He <almost> died.
(7) What words indicate that something is almost the best or worst example of some quality?
almost, nearly, practically, virtually, just about, verging on, bordering on
He is <almost> the worst student in the school.
(8) What words indicate that something is so similar to something that it is almost the same thing?
almost, practically, virtually
That dog is <almost> human.
(9) What words indicate that something is almost some quality (such as some color or shape)?
almost, more or less, practically, virtually, not quite
The road is <almost> straight.
(10) What words indicate that something is true of or has happened to almost all of something?
almost, nearly, practically, virtually, pretty well, more or less, just about
<Almost> everyone is sick.

Only
Hanya
Use this domain for words referring to only a particular number or amount of people or things--no more than one, or no more than a particular number or amount.
(1) What words describe the only person or thing?
only, sole, the one, lone, solitary, alone, one and only, single
I had four brothers, but I am the <only> one who is still alive.
(2) What words indicate that there is only a particular number or amount of something?
only, just, no more than, all
We <only> have five chairs.
(3) What words indicate something is true of only one thing or one group of things, and not true of others?
only, just, exclusively, nothing but, nothing else, be limited to, be restricted to, be confined to, be unique to, be peculiar to, exclusive
<Only> men can grow beards.
(4) What words indicate that something is only what you say it is, and not something more?
only, just, purely, merely, mere, nothing but
I don't want anything--I <only> want to help.

exact, precise
(2) What words indicate that a number or amount is exact?
exactly, precisely
(3) What words indicate that something happens at an exact time?
exactly, precisely, on the dot, sharp

right, bang, smack, plumb
(5) What words describe something that is exactly the same as another thing?

Approximate

(1) What words describe a number or amount that is approximate?

about, approximately, roughly, give or take, at a guess, somewhere in the region of, an estimated, some, something like, in round numbers, close to

(5) What words indicate an approximate number when the actual number is possibly less?
at most, as much as, short of
(6) What words refer to determining the approximate number of amount of something?
approximate (v), estimate (v), overestimate, underestimate

rounded to the nearest ten/hundred/thousand, round up, round down
(8) What words refer to a number that is approximate?
estimate (n), approximation, ballpark figure, round figure
(9) What words indicate that something happens at an approximate time?
about, around, approximately, round about, or thereabouts, circa, some time
(10) What words indicate that something happens at an approximate place?
about, around, in the vicinity of, near, close to
(11) What words describe something that is approximately the same as another thing?
narrowly, rather
(12) What words indicate that something is done in approximately the right way?
roughly, more or less, somewhat
(13) What words describe something that is approximately the same as another thing?
loose, vague, hazy, impressionistic, broad

Shadow
Bayang-bayang
Shadow
Bayang-bayang

Use this domain for words related to a shadow--the area on the ground where the light does not shine because something is in the way. For instance if the sun (or another light) is shining on an object, the area behind the object is in shadow (dark).

Gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan berkaitan kepada suatu bayang-bayang - kawasan di atas kawasan di mana cahaya tidak bercahaya kerana sesuatu menutupinya. Contohnya sekiranya matahari (ataupun cahaya lain) menyinar di atas satu objek, kawasan di bahagian belakang objek itu dibayangi (gelap)
(1) What words refer to a shadow?
(1) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada bayang-bayang?
shadow
Bayang-bayang, bayangan, kelibat,
The sun was hot, so we got under the shadow of a tree.
Matahari sedang panas terik oleh itu kami pun berteduh di bawah bayangan pokok.
(2) What words refer to something blocking the light from shining on something?
shade, cast a shadow, block the light, eclipse, overshadowing
You are in my light.
(3) What words describe something in the shadow of something else?
(3) Apakah perkataan mengambarkan sesuatu yang berada di dalam bayang-bayang sesuatu?
in the shade, shaded, shady, shadowy
Di dalam tempat teduh, tempat redup,
Old questions for \oldis 8.3.3.2.1

Use this domain for words describing something, such as a tool or way of doing something, that is proper for a particular time, place, purpose, or job. The words in this domain involve a comparison between two things, an item and a setting. An evaluation is made as to how good the item is in the setting. The words may be used only of certain types of items, certain types of settings, or certain types of usefulness.

Use this domain for words describing the appearance of something that has pleasing aspects or inspires awe and wonder in the viewer. For instance, the palace of a king, the home of a rich man, or a temple may be elaborately decorated and be described as glorious or magnificent. Or something in nature such as a sunset or flower may inspire awe and wonder.

Gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan mengambarkan kemunculan sesuatu yang mempunyai aspek mengembirakan atau menimbulkan rasa kagum dan ketakjuban kepada pemerhati. Contohnya, istana raja, rumah seorang yang kaya atau rumah ibadat yang dihiasi dengan indahnya dan digambarkan sesuatu yang hebat dan mengagumkan. Ataupun sesuatu di dalam alam seperti matahari terbit atau bunga yang menakjubkan dan mengagumkan.

Use this domain for words referring to temporal order or sequence--the order in which a group of events happen. Things and people may also be in order based on the order in which something happened or should happen to them.
(1) What words refer to the order or sequence of a group of events?
order, sequence, cycle, pattern, rota, order of events
(2) What words refer to a group of events that happen in order?
sequence, series, succession, chain, course, progression
(3) What words refer to a group of things in a series?
series, lineup, queue
(4) What words describe a group of things that have been put in order?

be in order, ordered, in sequence, be the right way round, in chronological order, chronological, consecutive, consecutively, successive, in succession, one after another, one after the other, (three years) running, sequential
(5) What words refer to doing things in order?
in order, take turns
(6) What words refer to the particular order in which something comes?
(6) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada urutan khusus di mana sesuatu itu muncul?
place, position, where something comes
Pertama, kemudian, selepas, terakhir, tamat, kesimpulan, penutup
(7) What words describe a group of things that have not been put in order?
unordered, out of sequence
(8) What words describe a group of things in the wrong order?
be out of order, be in the wrong order, be the wrong way round, backwards
(9) What words refer to something missing from a group of things in order?
gap
(10) In English 'Order' can be expressed by a noun phrase with no overt marker.
the last person (out the door)
(11) In English 'Order' can be expressed by a 'be' clause with the 'Item' in the subject position.
be
This child <was> first.
(12) In English 'Order' can be expressed by a noun phrase with the 'Item' marked by 'of'.
of
the second <of> the winners

Series
Use this domain for words related to a series--several things that happen one after another.
(1) What words refer to a series of things, events, numbers or people?
series, sequence, string of, succession of, stream, train of events, course of
(2) What words describe things in a series?
successive, consecutive, alternating, serial
(3) What words indicate that someone does things in a series?
in succession, one after the other, one after another, straight, in a row, running, alternate
(4) What words refer to the place that something has in a series?
place, order, rank, slot, grade
Order, sequence
First
Happen first
Terjadi terdahulu
Use this domain for words referring to something happening first--to be before all other things in order or time.
(1) What words describe something that is first in order or time?
first, original, initial, earliest, inaugural, prime
(2) What words indicate an event or action that is first?
first (adv), first of all, beginning with, starting with
(3) What words indicate that something happened when you first saw something?
at first sight, at first glance
(4) What words indicate that something is the first in a list of things that you will talk about?

(5) What words indicate that something happens or is done for the first time?
first, the first time
(6) What words refer to the first time someone does something?
debut, premiere, maiden (voyage)
(7) What words describe something that has never happened before?
unprecedented, a first
(8) What words refer to doing something that has never been done before?
be the first to do something, show the way, lead the way, pioneer, break new ground
(9) What words refer to being the first person to do something in a situation instead of waiting for someone else?
make the first move, take the initiative
(10) What words refer to the person who did something first?
pioneer, the first
(11) What words refer to something that is the first of its kind?
prototype, original (n)

Use this domain for words that indicate that something happens early--before the expected time, before the usual time, or before the time that was agreed on. Some words may include the idea that it is good that the event happened early. Other words may include the idea that it is bad that the event happened early.

Gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan yang mana mengambarkan sesuatu kejadian sebelum masa yang dijangkakan. Beberapa perkataan termasuklah buah fikiran yang baik tentang peristiwa yang terjadi lebih awal. Perkataan lain termasuklah buah fikiran bahawa betapa buruknya kejadian yang terjadi lebih awal.
(1) What words indicate that something happens early?
early (adv), ahead of time, ahead of schedule, in good time
(2) What words describe something that happens early?
early (adj)
(3) What words refer to something happening early?
be early
(4) What words indicate that something happens too early?
too early, too soon, untimely, premature, prematurely, jump the gun
(5) What words indicate that something happens early in the morning?
early, first thing, at the crack of dawn, bright and early
(6) What words indicate that something will happen no earlier than a particular time?
at the earliest, no earlier than

Contain
Use this domain for words that express the idea that something contains something.
(1) What words indicate that something contains something?
have, of, -'s, contain, hold
(2) In English 'Containership' can be expressed by a clause using the verb 'contain' with the 'Container' in the subject position and the 'Content' in the object position.
The cup <contained> milk.

(3) In English 'Containership' can be expressed by a clause using the verb with the 'Container' in the subject position, the 'Content' in the object position, and the 'Container' in a preposition phrase marked by 'in'.
The cup <has> milk <in it>.
(4) In English 'Containership' can be expressed by a noun phrase with the 'Container' as the head and the 'Content' marked by 'of'.
a cup <of> milk
(5) In English 'Containership' can be expressed by a noun phrase with the word 'container' as the head and the 'Content' marked by 'of'.
the <container> <of> milk
(6) In English 'Containership' can be expressed by a noun phrase with the word 'contents' as the head and the 'Container' marked by 'of'.
the <contents> <of> the cup
(7) In English 'Containership' can be expressed by a possession phrase with the 'Container' in the first position and the word 'contents' in the second position.
the cup<'s> <contents>
Container
